reporting-org.narrative: AVT-L Association of Victims of Terrorism Lebanon

title.narrative: Psychological support for victims of terrorism and armed groups

description.narrative: Workshops promoting dialogue and sharing experiences. During three days, 10 participants, who all have a traumatic experience in common, will share their experiences, speak about their trauma and receive adapted and tailored support.

participating-org.narrative: AVT-L - Association Libanaise des victimes du terrorisme

activity-date.narrative: 3 days workshop for 8 Lebanese victims of terrorism: 6 women and 2 men. The psychologist coordinates group discussions in the morning while the art-therapist organized art activities in the afternoon in order to help victims express their feelings and regain control of their lives.
